title: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe: Greg Miller vs. the World
description:
Friday, April 28th, Greg Miller is taking on Kinda Funny Best Friends in Mario Kart 8 Deluxe. Some won't survive. Sign up to play here: https://www.kindafunny.com/mariokart

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

transcript_chunks.text: Greg Miller and I challenge all of you on April 28th to come play me in Mario Kart 8 Deluxe on the Nintendo Switch. Now, when I started this, I said I was the best Mario Kart player around - it was just a little jab, I wanted to take a shot and punt into the sun, but guess what, Adam and Josh, you decided to open your fat mouths and get involved too, so now it's all of you. All of you come to twitch.tv/kindafunnygames and try to keep up - my name is Greg Miller, and I'm pretty good at Mario Kart now. Don't get me wrong, this isn't going to be an equal opportunity ass beating - any of you Kinda Funny Best Friends want to go to the forums and sign up to play me Friday, April 28th live from 12:30 to 5:00 p.m. Pacific Time - what time is it in Central Time? I don't care. Break your dick off here's the thing - you all show up and we do the grand prix, and we have a great time, but Zigger, you're the one I'm coming for first, you might

it in central time I don't care break your dick off here's the thing you all show up and we do the grand prix and we have a great time but Ziggy you're the one I'm coming for first you might remember you thought you were something special with your little Amiibo collection and your weird shirts and that anime pillow that I don't think you've been cleaning quite some time you said you could beat me so I'm picking my grand prix I'm challenging you you and me one-on-one and then of course as if that wasn't good enough if that wasn't worth tuning in to Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames Friday April 28th Sean Pitts, Sean Pitts, string beam number one over here from MyIG nice it's me Sean Pitts I can fit through a keyhole I'm a worm you Sean Pitts comes and bets $50 dollars on the match against me against Greg Miller Sean I'm taking your money and then of course once Shawn Pitt stood up little Ziggy got up too and he said oh let me pull up my diapers

Greg Miller says, "I'm taking your money" against me, Greg Miller. Sean, I'm taking your money, and then of course once Shawn Pitt stood up, little Zigger got up too, and he said, "Oh let me pull up my diapers." I put $50 down as well; I take that bet too, Zigger. I don't think you have that money to give, Zigs, and I'm going to take it from you because my name is Greg try to keep up Miller, and I'm good at Mario Kart, and I'm good at eating chicken wings, and I'm kind of all right at being a boyfriend, so what are you going to do, Kinda Funny Best Friends, when Greg Miller runs over you.
